name: Speeder Feeder
description:
Bring food to your neighbor, with the aid of a device that vaguely resembles a plane!

Fly low over crates to snag them with your hook, and drop them by pressing space.
Drop boxes directly into your neighbor's giant red mouth at the center of the map.
Don't let them go hungry!

Made for Ludum Dare 46: Keep It Alive
Download the windows version if the web version is running slowly!

If you liked this, try a flying game that I spent more than 3 days on: BIRDMANE
